attributes.action: Open the doors to parliment for the poor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To become a Member of Parliment you have to come up with money. Even though this is refunded, still puts a block on those who don't have it.
Even to be a Independant is the same situation. Therefore places a disadvantge to those of a less well of background.
The only thing that prevents myself and no doubt others.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
